00020 
00021 
00022 template<typename T1>
00023 inline
00024 typename T1::elem_type
00025 as_scalar(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X)
00026   {
00027   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00028   
00029   typedef typename T1::elem_type eT;
00030   
00031   const unwrap<T1>   tmp(X.get_ref());
00032   const Mat<eT>& A = tmp.M;
00033   
00034   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem != 1), "as_scalar(): expression doesn't evaluate to exactly one element" );
00035   
00036   return A.mem[0];
00037   }
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 template<typename T1>
00042 inline
00043 typename T1::elem_type
00044 as_scalar(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X)
00045   {
00046   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00047   
00048   typedef typename T1::elem_type eT;
00049   
00050   const unwrap_cube<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
00051   const Cube<eT>& A   = tmp.M;
00052   
00053   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem != 1), "as_scalar(): expression doesn't evaluate to exactly one element" );
00054   
00055   return A.mem[0];
00056   }
00057 
00058 
00059 template<typename T> struct arma_scalar_only { };
00060 
00061 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<char>   { typedef char   result; };
00062 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<short>  { typedef short  result; };
00063 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<int>    { typedef int    result; };
00064 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<long>   { typedef long   result; };
00065 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<float>  { typedef float  result; };
00066 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<double> { typedef double result; };
00067 
00068 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<unsigned char>  { typedef unsigned char  result; };
00069 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<unsigned short> { typedef unsigned short result; };
00070 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<unsigned int>   { typedef unsigned int   result; };
00071 template<> struct arma_scalar_only<unsigned long>  { typedef unsigned long  result; };
00072 
00073 template<typename T> struct arma_scalar_only< std::complex<T> > { typedef std::complex<T> result; };
00074 
00075 
00076 template<typename T>
00077 arma_inline
00078 const typename arma_scalar_only<T>::result &
00079 as_scalar(const T& x)
00080   {
00081   return x;
00082   }
